name: GCS Upload
description: Upload a file to Google Cloud Storage. (Converted from Langflow Store for AxieStudio compatibility)

credentials_file.name: credentials_file
credentials_file.info: Google Cloud service account JSON credentials file.

file_path.name: file_path
file_path.info: File to upload to Google Cloud Storage.

bucket_name.name: bucket_name
bucket_name.info: Name of the Google Cloud Storage bucket.

code.value:
from pathlib import Path
from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.io import FileInput, Output, MessageTextInput
from axiestudio.schema import Data

class GCSUploadComponent(Component):
    """Component to upload a file to Google Cloud Storage."""

    display_name = "GCS Upload"
    description = "Upload a file to Google Cloud Storage."
    icon = "google"
    name = "GCSUpload"

    inputs = [
        FileInput(
            name="file_path",
            display_name="File Path",
            file_types=["MP4"],
            info="File to upload to Google Cloud Storage.",
        ),
        FileInput(
            name="credentials_file",
            display_name="Credentials File",
            file_types=["json"],
            info="Google Cloud service account JSON credentials file.",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="bucket_name",
            display_name="Bucket Name",
            info="Name of the Google Cloud Storage bucket.",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="destination_blob_name",
            display_name="Destination Blob Name",
            info="Name of the destination blob in the bucket.",
        ),
    ]

    outputs = [Output(display_name="GCS URI", name="gcs_uri", method="upload_file")]

    def upload_file(self) -> str:
        """Uploads the file to Google Cloud Storage and returns the GCS URI."""
        from google.cloud import storage
        if not self.file_path or not self.credentials_file:
            self.log("File path or credentials file is missing.")
            raise ValueError("Please provide both a file and a credentials file.")

        # Initialize the Google Cloud Storage client
        storage_client = storage.Client.from_service_account_json(self.credentials_file)

        # Get the target bucket
        bucket = storage_client.bucket(self.bucket_name)

        # Create a blob object from the file path
        blob = bucket.blob(self.destination_blob_name)

        # Upload the file to the bucket
        blob.upload_from_filename(self.file_path)

        gcs_uri = f"gs://{self.bucket_name}/{self.destination_blob_name}"
        self.log(f"File uploaded to {gcs_uri}")

        return gcs_uri

from pathlib import Path
from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.io import FileInput, Output, MessageTextInput
from axiestudio.schema import Data

class GCSUploadComponent(Component):
    """Component to upload a file to Google Cloud Storage."""

    display_name = "GCS Upload"
    description = "Upload a file to Google Cloud Storage."
    icon = "google"
    name = "GCSUpload"

    inputs = [
        FileInput(
            name="file_path",
            display_name="File Path",
            file_types=["MP4"],
            info="File to upload to Google Cloud Storage.",
        ),
        FileInput(
            name="credentials_file",
            display_name="Credentials File",
            file_types=["json"],
            info="Google Cloud service account JSON credentials file.",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="bucket_name",
            display_name="Bucket Name",
            info="Name of the Google Cloud Storage bucket.",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="destination_blob_name",
            display_name="Destination Blob Name",
            info="Name of the destination blob in the bucket.",
        ),
    ]

    outputs = [Output(display_name="GCS URI", name="gcs_uri", method="upload_file")]

    def upload_file(self) -> str:
        """Uploads the file to Google Cloud Storage and returns the GCS URI."""
        from google.cloud import storage
        if not self.file_path or not self.credentials_file:
            self.log("File path or credentials file is missing.")
            raise ValueError("Please provide both a file and a credentials file.")

        # Initialize the Google Cloud Storage client
        storage_client = storage.Client.from_service_account_json(self.credentials_file)

        # Get the target bucket
        bucket = storage_client.bucket(self.bucket_name)

        # Create a blob object from the file path
        blob = bucket.blob(self.destination_blob_name)

        # Upload the file to the bucket
        blob.upload_from_filename(self.file_path)

        gcs_uri = f"gs://{self.bucket_name}/{self.destination_blob_name}"
        self.log(f"File uploaded to {gcs_uri}")

        return gcs_uri
